\w But|strong="G1438"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* constant mutual charity \w among|strong="G1519"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G1438"\w*: \w for|strong="G1519"\w* charity covereth \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w* \w of|strong="G0026"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*.
Using hospitality \w one|strong="G0240"\w* towards \w another|strong="G0240"\w*, \w without|strong="G0427"\w* murmuring,

\w As|strong="G5613"\w* \w every|strong="G1538"\w* \w man|strong="G1538"\w* hath \w received|strong="G2983"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*, \w ministering|strong="G1247"\w* \w the|strong="G2983"\w* \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w one|strong="G1538"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w another|strong="G1438"\w*: \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w stewards|strong="G3623"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G2983"\w* \w manifold|strong="G4164"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

Dearly \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w*, think \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w strange|strong="G3581"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w burning|strong="G4451"\w* heat \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* try \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w if|strong="G5613"\w* \w some|strong="G3588"\w* new \w thing|strong="G3581"\w* \w happened|strong="G1096"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*;

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w reproached|strong="G3679"\w* \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w blessed|strong="G3107"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w is|strong="G2316"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* honour, \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* power \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w is|strong="G2316"\w* \w his|strong="G1909"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, resteth \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.
